title: Open Syndrome Probable Legionnaires' Disease
description: Case definition for a probable case of Legionnaires' disease in the context of an outbreak

inclusion_criteria.name: Suspected case of pneumonia and exposure to an outbreak

values.name: Pneumonia
values.description: Clinical or radiological diagnosis of pneumonia

values.name: Outbreak exposure
values.description: Location and onset date(s) meet the outbreak-specific case definition for the exposure category: community-acquired, healthcare-associated and travel-associated.
